Html:
Hi,

I just go Word 2016 and the MHRA style does not show up in the various folders I have tried to put it in.

Can anyone please tell me where the bibliography files for Word 2016 should go?

Thanks.

I have (just now) seen this post http://bibword.codeplex.com/discussions/640595 related to MHRA and Word 2016, but it all seems like another language to me and I have no idea what to even do with the code in the post. Still, I'm, open to any help I can get.
